translations: n．笨蛋，傻瓜（复数）：指智力低下、学习能力差或行为愚蠢的人。
· The teacher was frustrated with the dunces in her class.
老师对班上的笨蛋感到很沮丧。

sentences.sentence: The defects of great men are the consolation of dunces.
sentences.translation: 伟人有缺点是愚人的安慰。

sentences.sentence: Tell these chicken-hearted dunces why you alone among them stand on the right side of the hall.
sentences.translation: 你告诉这些软弱无能的笨蛋，为什么这么多人中只有你站在大厅的右边。

sentences.sentence: When a true genius appears in the would you may know him by this sign, that the dunces are all in confederacy against him.
sentences.translation: 当一个真正的天才出现于世上的时候，你可以从下列迹象把他认出来——笨蛋们群起而反对他。
